meanings.definition: A very famous and successful performer or athlete.
meanings.sent1: The megastars of the music industry sell out stadiums around the world.
meanings.sent2: Fans eagerly awaited the arrival of the megastars at the red carpet event.
meanings.sent3: The megastars decided to start a band with their pets for a fun twist.
meanings.sent4: In the galaxy of sports, he shone like a megastar among the ordinary players.
meanings.sent5: The megastars' charisma and talent lit up the stage, leaving the audience in awe.

meanings.definition: A celestial body that is extremely bright and luminous.
meanings.sent1: The megastars in the night sky twinkled beautifully above us.
meanings.sent2: Astronomers study the megastars to understand the mysteries of the universe.
meanings.sent3: The little girl imagined the megastars as glittering diamonds in the sky.
meanings.sent4: The megastars in the galaxy danced together in a cosmic ballet.
meanings.sent5: The megastars' brilliance outshone all other celestial bodies, captivating observers.
